oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Edmonton Area Survey, 1979
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Population Research Laboratory
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: This survey of households across the province of Alberta continues to enable academic researchers, government departments, and non-profit organizations to explore a wide range of topics in a structured research framework and environment. SponsorsÂ™ research questions are asked together with demographic questions in a telephone interview of Alberta households.
